item.description: These are mostly songs, checkout poems ‚Äã Amitabh Bhattacharya Album: Lootera (2013) ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§∏‡•á ‡§ú‡•ã ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Å‡§ó‡§æ ‡§π‡§ø‡§∏‡•ç‡§∏‡§æ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡§æ ‡§§‡•ã ‡§¨‡§¶‡§≤‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§π‡§µ‡§æ ‡§®‡•á ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ç‡§∏ ‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§Ö‡§ï‡•á‡§≤‡•á‡§™‡§® ‡§∏‡•á ‡§õ‡•á‡§°‡§º‡•Ä ‡§ú‡§¨ ‡§ó‡•Å‡§´‡§º‡•ç‡§§‡§ó‡•Ç ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•á ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤ ‡§®‡•á ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§æ‡§ú‡§º ‡§¶‡•Ä – Zinda (Lootera) ‚Äã Avicii True (2013) I tried carrying the weight of the world But I only have two hands I hope I get the chance to travel the world But I don’t have any plans
